sentences.sContent: Regular exercise is a good habit.
Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.sCn: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.sContent: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.sCn: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.sContent: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.sCn: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

sentences.sContent: ...organisations need to learn something bigger than how to manage teams better: they need to be in the habit of asking themselves whether teams are the best tools for the job...
...one must make a habit of regular meals...
...But reading is a difficult habit to form...
...because early marine engines had a nasty habit of breaking down...
...it will be difficult for them to aqcuire a reading habit later in life...
